title: Brazil Proposed Internet Regulation. Big Tech Took the Gloves Off
description: Lawmakers want to make online platforms more responsible for hate speech and misinformation. Google, Meta, and others are fighting back.

title: A Radical Plan to Make AI Good, Not Evil
description: OpenAI competitor Anthropic says its Claude chatbot has a built-in “constitution” that can instill ethical principles and keep systems from going rogue.

title: Should You Get Paid for Teaching a Chatbot to Do Your Job?
description: Data from top-performing employees can create AI helpers that boost everyone’s productivity—but also create new concerns over fair pay.

title: How To Delete Your Data From ChatGPT
description: OpenAI has new tools that give you more control over your information—although they may not go far enough.
